mapper.select: SELECT A.BrandID, A.BrandCN, A.BrandEN, B.ImageSrc, A.InUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.InDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS InDate, A.LastEditUser, DATE_FORMAT(A.LastEditDate, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') AS LastEditDate FROM Brand A INNER JOIN Image B ON A.BrandID = B.ObjectID WHERE B.ObjectType = 'B' AND B.ImageType = 'N' ORDER BY InDate DESC LIMIT #{arg0,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{arg1,jdbcType=INTEGER};
SELECT BrandID, BrandCN, BrandEN, InUser, InDate, LastEditUser, LastEditDate FROM Brand WHERE BrandID = #{brandID,jdbcType=INTEGER}
SELECT BrandID, BrandCN, BrandEN, InUser, InDate, LastEditUser, LastEditDate FROM Brand WHERE (BrandCN = #{brandName,jdbcType=NVARCHAR} OR BINARY BrandEN = #{brandName,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
